trends: There have been no other sightings in Montevideo

divs: sighting detailsthe ufo seen was still at sunset on the horizon to the north, it appeared to be a comet but without and three nuclei bright the ufo seen here was still at sunset on the horizon to the north, it appeared to be a comet but with three bright nuclei. a few days before the afternoon also another ufo which left a line of smoke, but it was not a plane. a few days after the day of ufo seen in this report and the picture that you can see that they continued shipping rare events reported and many people also see an object at sunset, leaving a trail of smoke in the sky. on that last evening that the activity was reported a local tv channel (chronicle tv) was transmitting live in a protest on a route and i saw that people looked at the sky and just realized that there was an object crosses unusual about them leaving a trail. it was reported live, it was not shot but if the smoke left. this ends to give credence to my report and the strange activity ufo in my town these two weeks. i have seen several ufos here and the photo i saw him when he went to the car by the road 3 that crosses buenos aires. the photo did not take me, but that is what i saw. the photo was taken with a telescope with a zoom of 40x and was rising by another user in the page of a local group of ufo research. the picture taken is incredible, true and authentic. sources: www.glaucoart.com.ar www.cronicatv.com.ar this is the object that visited buenos aires in may, but was filmed well in mar del plata .. here is the video. credits thanks. this is the objet that i saw and the ufo reported in may 2007...here in video http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=_3jxccx3flm&feature=related)
